nodes.text: Ithor Wanderer was an Ithorian Herdship.
Ithor Wanderer was similar to almost every other Ithorian Herdship, being a huge flattened ball which was designed to simulate the jungles of Ithor, the Ithorian homeworld, in a space-worthy vessel.
Ithor Wanderer followed a slow course along the galaxy-spanning Hydian Way.
